item.title: How do i make it so 2 People can use a command
item.dc:creator: @sinzscapeserver sinzscapeserver
item.description:
@sinzscapeserver wrote:

if (command.startsWith("givemod") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("owner mark")) { String name = command.substring(8); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sM("You have been promoted to Moderator by "+playerName+". Log out to see changes."); c.playerRights = 1; savegame(true); sM("You've promoted "+command.substring(4)+" to Moderator."); yell(""+playerName+" has promoted "+command.substring(4)+" to Moderator."); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }
how do i make it so me and some one named derik can use it

Read full topic
